channel.title: Comments on: T-Mobile Dash + Android + 3G = Dream Phone

item.title: By: Which Android Phone Is For Me? » Gadgets » Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Which Android Phone Is For Me? » Gadgets » Russell Heimlich
item.description: [...] a year ago I said all I wanted was “a Dash form factor running the Android OS with 3G support.” A lot has changed since then, including my expectations of phones. It is clear the Dash form [...]

item.title: By: Dash Lover
item.dc:creator: Dash Lover
item.description: I just need a Dash with 3g and I could die happy. I lost mine about a year ago on a drunken night out. Broke my heart :( As I refuse to buy a new one, knowing there are 3g phones on Tmobile
item.content:encoded:
I just need a Dash with 3g and I could die happy. I lost mine about a year ago on a drunken night out. Broke my heart
As I refuse to buy a new one, knowing there are 3g phones on Tmobile
